GSD.description:
efi: runtime: avoid EFIv2 runtime services on Apple x86 machines

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.96 by commit b0f1cc093bc2493ac259c53766fd2b800e085807. For more details please see the references link.
